team.title: CEO and Co-Founder
team.bio:
Larry is a seasoned professional and entrepreneur who has served at the executive level for start-ups and enterprises in mobile, Saas, data, digital media, publishing, creative agencies and venture capital.

With a unique and divergent skillset, heâ€™s capable of leading from concept to capital to customers. With a keen sense for innovation and forward-thinking vision, he thrives in challenging, fast-paced environments where performance and creation directly impact the bottom line.

team.title: Solutions Architect and Co-Founder
team.bio:
Matthew is an experienced solutions architect who has developed and managed software solutions for web, mobile, cloud and enterprise.
He uses craftsmanship and keen attention to detail to quickly build stable, reliable and scalable software platforms.

Matthew can quickly pivot as new business requirements emerge, all while maintaining the integrity of the solution.
